attributes.additional_details:
My aim is to have speed bumps put down on Bloomsbury Lane, this is to prevent any serious accidents from happening to our children and other members of the general public, as we all aware the speed in which vehicles travel down our road is  irresponsible and extremely dangerous, I've written to our local MP who has given me his full backing, but unfortunately the local government don't seem to think that this is necessary?
This petition will be sent to Graham Brady MP and to the following parties.
Cllr. Angela Bruer Morris. Angela.bruer-morris@trafford.gov.uk
Cllr. Neil Taylor. Neil.taylor@trafford.gov.uk &
Cllr. Jane Brophy.  Jane.brophy@traford.gov.uk

I urge you all to sign this petition and help save our children from any harm done to these law breakers.
